actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide compensation to lessees of certain Federal land located in Missouri for losses sustained in 1981 as a result of the flooding of such land.

summary.text: Entitles named individuals to receive specified compensation from the Secretary of the Treasury in full satisfaction of claims against the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide compensation to lessees of certain Federal land located in Missouri for losses sustained in 1981 as a result of the flooding of such land.
